invalid_argument.description: A request argument holds an invalid value

mutually_exclusive.description: Mutually exclusive parameters have been provided

too_many_arguments.description: An argument contains too many keys or values

unexpected_argument.description: An unexpected argument has been provided

body_required.message: The request must specify a body.

unexpected_type_assertion.message: An unexepected type assertion "%s" has been invoked on attribute "%s".

invalid_id.description: _id values cannot start with an underscore
invalid_id.message: Invalid "_id" value: cannot start with an underscore

forbidden_argument.description: A forbidden argument has been provided
forbidden_argument.message: The argument "%s" is not allowed by this API action.

koncorde_unknown_keyword.description: An unknown keyword has been provided in filters
koncorde_unknown_keyword.message: The keyword "%s" is not part of Koncorde filters DSL keywords. Are you trying to use an Elasticsearch query?

koncorde_restricted_keyword.description: A restricted keyword has been provided in filters
koncorde_restricted_keyword.message: The %s "%s" of Koncorde DSL is not supported for search queries.

action_locked.description: Cannot execute the requested action because it's already executing

overloaded.description: The request has been discarded because the server is overloaded
overloaded.message: Request discarded: Kuzzle Server is temporarily overloaded.

connection_dropped.description: The request has been discarded because its linked client connection has dropped

incompatible_sdk_version.description: SDK is incompatible with the current Kuzzle version
incompatible_sdk_version.message: Incompatible SDK client. Your SDK version (%s) does not match Kuzzle requirement (%s).

shutting_down.description: This Kuzzle node is shutting down and refuses new requests
shutting_down.message: Rejected: this node is shutting down.

too_many_requests.description: The request has been refused because a rate limit has been exceeded for this user
too_many_requests.message: Rejected: requests rate limit exceeded for this user.

admin_exists.description: Attempted to create the first administrator, when one already exists

incomplete_multiple_request.description: Failed to execute some or all actions requested
incomplete_multiple_request.message: At least one of the %s actions failed.

not_enough_nodes.description: The Kuzzle cluster has not enough nodes available, and no new requests can be processed until new nodes are added
not_enough_nodes.message: Rejected: this cluster is disabled because there aren't enough nodes connected.

unauthorized_origin.description: The domain reaching out to Kuzzle is not authorized

too_many_logins_requests.description: The request was denied because the maximum number of login attempts per second has been exceeded.
too_many_logins_requests.message: Rejected: Too many login attempts per second
